Hoboken.Kent Fine Art:
Kent Fine Art is an art gallery in New York City founded in 1985 by Douglas Walla.


== About ==
Kent Fine Art was incorporated in 1985 and opened its first location at the corner of Madison & 57th Street in the Fuller Building, New York. Since this first location in midtown, the gallery has maintained galleries in Soho, and presently in Chelsea on 25th Street.
